entry.name: LANDING_TARGET_TYPE_LIGHT_BEACON
entry.description: Landing target signaled by light beacon (ex: IR-LOCK)

entry.name: LANDING_TARGET_TYPE_RADIO_BEACON
entry.description: Landing target signaled by radio beacon (ex: ILS, NDB)

entry.name: LANDING_TARGET_TYPE_VISION_FIDUCIAL
entry.description: Landing target represented by a fiducial marker (ex: ARTag)

entry.name: LANDING_TARGET_TYPE_VISION_OTHER
entry.description: Landing target represented by a pre-defined visual shape/feature (ex: X-marker, H-marker, square)

message.name: RALLY_FETCH_POINT2
message.description: Request a current rally point from MAV. MAV should respond with a RALLY_POINT message. MAV should not respond if the request is invalid.
